top5.amount.points.usage: Usage: !topamount (amount) - Set how many viewers will appear in the !top points list.
top5.amount.max: The max amount of users is 15.
top5.amount.points.set: $1 users will now show in the !top command.
top5.amount.time.usage: Usage: !toptimeamount (amount) - Set how many viewers will appear in the !toptime list.
top5.amount.time.set: $1 viewers will now show in the !toptime command.
